long_description: For full-on alpine conditions, the DAS parka for women is the warmest insulated jacket from Patagonia. It keeps you warm and dry with high-loft PrimaLoft(R) and a water-resistant, windproof shell. Parka is insulated throughout with 120g of PrimaLoft(R) Synergy, with an added layer of heat-trapping PrimaLoft(R) One in the chest, abdomen and back for core warmth. Lightweight PU-coated nylon ripstop shell is durable, highly water resistant, windproof and treated with a Durable Water Repellenet finish that beads up water so it rolls off. Helmet-compatible hood has visor and single-pull drawcord to adjust overall volume and peripheral vision. Full-length 2-way zipper features an internal, insulated wind flap and fold-over zipper garage for comfort. Zippered, insulated handwarmer pockets; 2 large interior mesh drop-in pockets; exterior zippered chest pocket. Baffled internal collar, elasticized cuffs and discreet drawcord at droptail hem seal in warmth. Patagonia DAS parka for women comes with a stuff sack.
short_description: For full-on alpine conditions, the DAS parka for women is the warmest insulated jacket from Patagonia. It keeps you warm and dry with high-loft PrimaLoft(R) and a water-resistant, windproof shell.
